    • PCP_SYMPTOM_THRESHOLD

      public static final int PCP_SYMPTOM_THRESHOLD
      These are thresholds for patients to seek symptom-driven care - they'll go to the appropriate provider based on which threshold they meet. By CDC statistics (https://www.cdc.gov/nchs/data/ahcd/namcs_summary/2015_namcs_web_tables.pdf), a person goes to an average of 24,904,00/(US adult population = 249485228) = .0998 urgent visits per year. The goal for the number of symptom-driven encounters (urgent care, PCP, and ER) is .0998 * age.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • createEncounter

      public static HealthRecord.Encounter createEncounter​(Person person, long time, HealthRecord.EncounterType type, java.lang.String specialty, HealthRecord.Code code)
      Create an Encounter that is coded, with a provider organzation, and a clinician.
      Parameters:
      person - The patient.
      time - The time of the encounter.
      type - The type of encounter (e.g. emergency).
      specialty - The clinician specialty (e.g. "General Practice")
      code - The code to assign to the encounter.
      Returns:
      The encounter.

    • getWellnessVisitCode

      public static HealthRecord.Code getWellnessVisitCode​(Person person, long time)
      Get the correct Wellness Visit Code by age of patient.
      Parameters:
      person - The patient.
      time - The time of the encounter which we translate to age of patient.
      Returns:
      SNOMED-CT code for Wellness Visit.
